long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tap The Rat is an addicting HTML5 Construct 2 Tap Endless Game.
Hey, kitty! Are you ready to ‘tap’ some rats? Collect mice and bonus before time runs out!

INTRODUCTION
Play Tap The Rat on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Tap The Rat extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Tap The Rat icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Tap The Rat popup will open. Tap on the popup or press "Spacebar" to start ;)
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
Tap the rat to get them
Just remember: Tap ‘em to get ‘em! Collect coins and try to beat your best score!

CONTACT

PRIVACY POLICY
